caption.p: Cytotoxicity effect of ( a) mastic essential oil and its major components, ( b) myrcene and ( c) α-pinene, at 24 h or 48 h on HaCaT cells, as determined by the SRB assay. Representative figures of at least three experiments. Results are shown as mean ± SD ( n = 3). Note: * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001 vs. control (untreated cells).
